alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 10:48AM CDT until April 10 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yazoo River At Yazoo City affecting Yazoo County. Yalobusha At Whaley affecting Carroll and Leflore Counties. For the Lower Yazoo ...including Whaley, Greenwood, Belzoni, Yazoo City, Sunflower, Anguilla...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yalobusha At Whaley. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Lowland flooding is occurring near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 19.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 21.5 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Yalobusha Whaley 21.0 19.8 Fri 10 am CD 21.0 21.5 20.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 8 PM CDT.
